[set page_title]Payment Preferences - Skipjack[/set] [set ui_checklist]1[/set] [set help_name]wizard.skipjack[/set] @_UI_STD_HEAD_@
Enter your Skipjack account ID, usually the only parameter required. Sometimes you may need to enter a partner code as well -- refer to your SkipjackIC documentation.
